title: Where is RGM found in the new client?
body: According to [this](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-0) page RGM is happening...but i cannot seem to find it in the new client...Halp. Am i on drugs? Is it super obvious and i'm blind AF?

replies.body:
Bahahaha no worries bruh! This porobro's gotchu covered. If you click on Play -> PVP you should see the RGM on the far right. Anytime those RGM's are active, that's where you'll find them ^_^!

https://i.gyazo.com/d9a5ffa95842812102922cd7bf218d32.png
